title: to all the adc's who say thank you or your a beast support
body:
i would just like to thank you. you people have inspired me. my hope was dying out for the community and you have inspired me. even though i was doing badly at one point, the things you said were...unnatural haha. having your adc say no ****ing way, your the one that CARRIED ME is the best thing in the world to hear, especially when you dont play support that often. the sivir i had this afternoon i think was a 1 of a kind in the fact that they said thank you and your a god. so thank you and plz never lose this aspect. you will inspire anyone that you meet.
EDIT: because of this i played first time annie and went and got a score of 16:1 because of how happy i was feeling after this.

replies.body:
Wow this biased crap is really upsetting to watch.

I feel sorry for all of your parents, bringing up trolls who shoot people like this down over nothing.

I know I can't change anything here which really sucks (your fine shuffled pancake) but he is right, positive reinforcement means nearly everything for some players. 

Especially which is super evident here, in a community like this...
y u so cruel?

You don't deserve any recognition at all, most of the time a support hinders the ADC. The fact you don't say thanks to the ADC, or mid or jungler or top for working as a team and demand praise yourself is stupid.

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=04MEW3Eg,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-24T08:50:00.372+0000)
>
> Doesnt make sense if the adc cant get kills (bot lane) WITHOUT SUPPORT

If that were true I'd believe you, but you can solo lane an ADC and still do very well, explains Vayne and Quinn toplane. Now I have done many botlanes with terrible supports and carried them to victory and such. An ADC can be 0/4 but if they have 200 CS (which most supports don't help with) they can still carry.

Are you dense? Vayne and Quinn top lane work well because there's only one champion fighting them in lane, and they're ranged champs in a very melee centered lane. It's like how Teemo became extremely popular toplane because he could just laugh and kill champs from poison.

An ADC solo in botlane dies. This is just the truth. You can't go for the enemy ADC, as their support will peel you off and smack you into the dirt for the ADC to riddle you bullets, arrows or axes.

A support, and a good one at that, IS part of not only the team, but the ADC as well. Without a good support an ADC is nothing.

He has every right to expect recognition and to be grateful when people congratulate him for playing well in his role.


The game isn't won on who scores the most kills. It's won by who works together and takes objectives. Can't do that without a good Support.

You didnt read what i said clearly, i said If the adc needs a support to get kills then your point doesnt make sense, Also if a support is hindering the adc (not in any sort of high elo) then they roam makes sense?

i can honestly say that even if your support is doing badly (like i was), and you say something little like gw sona or that was amazing, can really make a difference. i was 1-4-6 in lane as as soon as my adc said what he said i played better than i was and made better plays than what i had been doing. im not saying that its the supports who carry the adc's, but they can help

This works both ways though, the way this thread is said is that ADC's don't say thank you at all, if my support does a damn good job then I said 'gj' or good work, but if they don't then they're not getting anything from me, I can be 17/0 and won't get a good work from a support, I can use heal to save them and they wont even say ty, but if I let them die I'm a 'typical scumbag adc who would be lost without them'. It takes two to tango, and it's not one sided, both roles are as bad as each other.

who are you talking to Tr?

I main adc, I most of the time praise them and tell them they are the one carrying me and making me look good, unless (i'm having a bad game LOL) or unless they are kinda toxic or genuinely useless lol which isn't very often, I find most supports friendly and like to praise them.

Here are some truths you need to learn:

1) You aren't a god, you suck at this game but that's alright because everyone does. Basically anyone on OCE below top 50 challenger is trash and most solo queue games are just a retard-fest, even at challenger level.

2) If you want to lie to your team and tell them they're not retarded then go ahead. If you take a whole lot of developmentally challenged kids and put them in a room there's bound to be plenty of hugging until one of them tard-rages out and stabs another with scissors. If you want positive reinforcement then, as support, YOU should be the one sucking your teammates off because you're the only one who doesn't have to farm. You're pretty much the team's cheerleader.

3) Supports don't carry games. Unless you're actually a good support, which you almost certainly are not, you rely on your team doing the heavy lifting while you walk up and down the brush missing skillshots and watching your AD carry get bullied. You don't deserve adulation just for doing your job.
how do i miss skillshots as sona?
Congratulations! You are part of the problem!
